title: Oxygen Vacancies Coupled with Surface Silicide Facilitate the CO2 Activation at Near-Room Temperature for Efficient Methane Productivity on Ni-Oxide Supported Pd Nanoparticles
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00482E, Paper
Thomas Yang, Amisha Beniwal, Dinesh Bhalothia, Che Yan, Chia-Hsin Wang, Tsan-Yao Chen
The catalytic conversion of carbon dioxide (CO2) into valuable commodities stands as a promising avenue for addressing both energy and environmental challenges. Among the key processes involved, CO2 methanation plays...
